reviewText:
I love this movie.  The lead guy is very easy on the eyes and the dancing is contagious.  You just have to get up and shake the butt around the room.

Annabeth Gish maybe a little stiff in the dancing department, but she holds up pretty well by the last dance.

Good fun, good music!!
Will someone PLEASE tell me WHERE I can buy The Way She Moves on DVD player that I can play it on American( USA) System? This is RIDICULOUS that they ALL saying it can't play on regular USA players.
One of the best dancing movies - wish they made more since they have a TV show about nothing but dancing.  Annabeth Gish is one of my favorite actresses ever.
movie won't play it says not allowed i got riped off
I love this movie! I just wish I could find it on dvd!
My wife and I love this movie. I hope you get it back to buy. Please thank You for your business

I'm writing this at a time when the USA (region 1) version is unavailable on Amazon.

So go to Amazon's UK site (dot co dot uk) and look up this movie there.  It's region 2, which might give you issues, as region 1 is standard in the USA.  You can typically decode it with HandBrake software, which *should* be legal since you own the movie and can rightfully copy your own copy, right?  I'm not a lawyer, but it sure seems legalish.

Anyhow, It's about 3x the price it should be with shipping to the USA, but worth it if you really want it and want to buy it the legal way.
I love this movie. I feel that it is a hispanic twist to Dirty Dancing. I have always wanted to learn to salsa dance.

Have searched everywhere for this DVD with no luck...AMAZON!  PLEASE bring this back for purchase!!!  Very enjoyable and the dancing in the movie is great and the chemistry between the characters is too.
I loved the movie the way she moves if they had it avaible I would buy it in a heart beat that is much I loved it
